```{ class="sas"}
%macro afficher(tab=);
title "Afficher les données de &tab.";
PROC print data=&tab. noobs;
RUN;
%mend afficher;

%afficher(tab=sashelp.cars)

proc sql;
select Name, Age, Height*2.54 as HeightCM format 5.1,
       Birthdate format=date9.
    from pg1.class_birthdate
    where age > 14
    order by Height desc;
quit; 

```
